verificationCardId.description: A random 32 characters hexadecimal string identifying the verification card. Corresponds to vc_id in the specification.

verificationCardSetId.description: A random 32 characters hexadecimal string identifying the verification card set. Corresponds to vcs in the specification.

items.description: Corresponds to hLVCC_id_j in the specification.

hashedLongVoteCastReturnCodeShares.description: The CCR's hashed long Vote Cast Return Code shares. Corresponds to (hlVCC_id_1, hlVCC_id_2, hlVCC_id_3, hlVCC_id_4) in the specification.
